Christmas Island
programme.desc: When a snowstorm diverts Kate's first private flight to Christmas Island, she must team up with an air traffic controller to secure her dream job as the family's pilot.

programme.title: Three Wise Men and a Baby
programme.desc: Three brothers get the surprise of their lives when they are forced to work together and care for a baby over the holidays.

programme.title: Believe in Christmas
programme.desc: With no other plans for Christmas, best friends Bea and Emilia travel to Christmasland, a magical place filled with hope, holiday miracles and romance.

programme.title: Christmas on Cherry Lane
programme.desc: Three families celebrate Christmas at turning points in their lives.

programme.title: Trivia at St. Nick's
programme.desc: Locals compete in a Christmas bar trivia tournament at the end of the semester.

programme.title: Christmas at the Golden Dragon
programme.desc: When Romy and Rick's parents surprise them with news that they'll be closing their decades-old Chinese restaurant, the siblings soon find themselves reevaluating their futures.

programme.title: If I Only Had Christmas
programme.desc: A cheerful publicist teams up with a cynical business owner to help a charity in need at Christmastime.

programme.title: Rescuing Christmas
programme.desc: Erin unwittingly wishes away Christmas, and Sam steps in to help bring it back.

programme.title: Christmas in Tahoe
programme.desc: To save her family's hotel Christmas show, a talent booker must ask for help from her ex-boyfriend -- the lead guitarist of a now-famous band that fired her as its manager years ago.

programme.title: The Most Wonderful Time of the Year
programme.desc: A snowbound stranger (Warren Christie) brightens the holidays for a retired police officer (Henry Winkler) and his niece (Brooke Burns).

programme.title: Christmas Under Wraps
programme.desc: After unexpectedly moving to Alaska, an ambitious doctor starts a new romance and learns that her small town is hiding a holiday secret.

programme.title: A Christmas Cookie Catastrophe
programme.desc: Sparks fly between the new CEO of a small-town cookie company and the owner of a local bakery as they try to recreate a stolen secret recipe.

programme.title: To Have and To Holiday
programme.desc: After a brief courtship, Celeste and Jason get engaged. Celeste then asks her pastor father, who's not ready to let his daughter go, to officiate their Christmas wedding.

programme.title: Private Princess Christmas
programme.desc: After failing in her royal duties, Princess Violet is sent to an American leadership training program where she makes and unexpected connection with the stoic instructor, Captain Ryan.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Joyful Mrs. Miracle
programme.desc: Mrs. Miracle uses Christmas magic to reunite three siblings who must decide who will inherit the family's real estate empire, following their grandmother's passing.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Joyful Mrs. Miracle
programme.desc: Mrs. Miracle uses Christmas magic to reunite three siblings who must decide who will inherit the family's real estate empire, following their grandmother's passing.

programme.title: Christmas at the Plaza
programme.desc: When historian Jessica is hired to create the Plaza's Christmas display, she finds more than facts while teaming up with handsome decorator Nick to bring the display to life.

programme.title: A Royal Queens Christmas
programme.desc: A prince makes his way to Queens, N.Y., when a local woman enlists his help for a children's Christmas show.

programme.title: The Most Colorful Time of the Year
programme.desc: A colorblind elementary school teacher meets an optometrist who helps bring color into his life in time for the holidays.

programme.title: Holiday Crashers
programme.desc: Best friends Toni and Bri have worked at the same card shop for more years than they should as both struggle to find their true life's path. Toni and Bri decide to create new identities to crash the Christmas parties.

programme.title: The Secret Gift of Christmas
programme.desc: A personal shopper helps her new client and recent widower reconnect with his young daughter, find them both everything on their wish list, and rediscover the joys of Christmas.

programme.title: Our Holiday Story
programme.desc: A loving couple shares the story of how they met and fell in love when their daughter's boyfriend comes to meet them for the first time at Christmas.

programme.title: The Finnish Line
programme.desc: Anya, inspired by her father's legacy, competes in Finland's Joulurauha race. Partnered with a new dog, she faces challenges, her father's rival, and her own anxieties.

programme.title: Deck the Walls
programme.desc: Interior designer, Rose DeMonte, uses her skills back in her hometown to renovate a Christmas Charity Home for her brother Sal and his contractor Brysen's home flipping company.

programme.title: A Maple Valley Christmas
programme.desc: Erica is a rancher who's spent her whole life working the family farm with her mother and sister. When Aaron arrives and disrupts her plans, she starts to question what it is she actually wants.

programme.title: Private Princess Christmas
programme.desc: After failing in her royal duties, Princess Violet is sent to an American leadership training program where she makes and unexpected connection with the stoic instructor, Captain Ryan.

programme.title: Sugarplummed
programme.desc: When Emily wishes for a perfect Christmas like the ones found in the popular Sugarplum movies, she's shocked when Sugarplum herself appears to help her fulfill it.

programme.title: Christmas in Angel Falls
programme.desc: Guardian angel Gabby is sent to the town of Angel Falls to restore its Christmas spirit. As she helps the townspeople to revive their traditions, Gabby meets a volunteer fire chief who teaches her the truth about the love she admires from afar.

programme.title: A Dance in the Snow
programme.desc: Melanie wants to create an inclusive Christmas dance for her daughter Jenny, not realizing Jenny is planning a dance of her own to honor Melanie.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Lights
programme.desc: Emily reluctantly returns home to her family's rescue ranch to organize the Christmas Carnival and works with a handsome artist to honor her mother.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Lights
programme.desc: Emily reluctantly returns home to her family's rescue ranch to organize the Christmas Carnival and works with a handsome artist to honor her mother.

programme.title: Under the Christmas Sky
programme.desc: Sparks fly between astronaut Kat and by-the-book David when they work on a planetarium exhibit that's opening right before Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas in Love
programme.desc: Ellie must decide if she should trust the big city CEO she is falling for, but more importantly, whether to take a leap of faith in making her own dreams come true.

programme.title: A Gift to Remember
programme.desc: A hopeless romantic, Darcy, insists on being swept off her feet. One day, while bicycling to work, Darcy crashes into a sharply dressed man walking his dog. He falls into a coma; she takes the dog home, waiting to reunite him with his owner.

programme.title: We Wish You a Married Christmas
programme.desc: Taking advice from their marriage coach, a couple visit a quiet town to reconnect during Christmastime.

programme.title: Home for Christmas Day
programme.desc: A young woman begins a long-distance relationship with an active-duty soldier. Her mother tries to steer her away from the relationship to save her feelings.

programme.title: Christmas in Evergreen: Tidings of Joy
programme.desc: A skeptical writer shows up in Evergreen to get the scoop on the town's famed passion for Christmas during a search for a long-lost time capsule.

programme.title: Holly & Ivy
programme.desc: A contractor helps a woman renovate a house so she can adopt a sick neighbor's two children.

programme.title: Long Lost Christmas
programme.desc: Hayley is an interior designer who plans to surprise her recently widowed mother with the perfect holiday present -- the extended family she knows her mom yearns for.

programme.title: My Sweet Austrian Holiday
programme.desc: Charlotte inherits a chocolate shop from her grandparents but soon finds herself in a battle with a large developer who wants to buy the building to turn it into an exclusive shopping boutique.

programme.title: Five Star Christmas
programme.desc: After moving back to her hometown, a woman plots with her siblings and grandparents to help her father's new bed and breakfast get a five-star review from an incognito travel critic.

programme.title: Mystery on Mistletoe Lane
programme.desc: New to town, Heidi Wicks and her kids discover a Christmas mystery in their historic home. Local handyman and historian David helps along the way, finding his own surprising connection.

programme.title: Just in Time for Christmas
programme.desc: A young psychology professor has to choose between marrying her longtime beau or accepting a once-in-a-lifetime job. To help her make a decision, a magical messenger lets her see both possible futures so she'll be able to make the right decision.

programme.title: Time for Me to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Two strangers, a businesswoman and a country music star, are both booked on a flight to Tulsa before the holidays, but it ends up getting canceled due to a snowstorm. They decide to try to get to Tulsa together, and share their secrets along the way.

programme.title: Time for Us to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Five guests are mysteriously invited to an inn to celebrate Christmas and soon investigate their connection to each other.

programme.title: A December Bride
programme.desc: Layla accompanies Seth to her cousin's wedding, and everyone is surprised when she announces they're engaged. They are forced to keep up the pretense, and as they spend more time together, they find themselves feeling something very real.

programme.title: My Christmas Guide
programme.desc: After losing his eyesight, a college professor adopts a seeing-eye dog from a guide dog trainer. As they all spend time together, his confidence returns and his heart begins to open.

programme.title: A Homecoming for the Holidays
programme.desc: Country singer Charlotte is home for the holidays and works with her brother's friend to build a house for a friend in town.

programme.title: Five Gold Rings
programme.desc: An artist returns home for the holidays and gets tasked with a Christmas quest left by her grandmother. She and the local PI must return lost items to their owners before Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas on My Mind
programme.desc: Lucy Lovett wakes up holding a wedding dress and assumes she is about to marry the love her life, Zach Callahan.

programme.title: Northern Lights of Christmas
programme.desc: Life deals Zoey Hathaway a strange blow when she inherits a reindeer farm and becomes buried in taking care of the animals and all of the Christmas responsibilities.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Lights
programme.desc: Emily reluctantly returns home to her family's rescue ranch to organize the Christmas Carnival and works with a handsome artist to honor her mother.

programme.title: The Christmas Promise
programme.desc: Nicole learns to deal with grief, with the help of her grandfather and a carpenter she hires to renovate the home that was once meant for her and her fiancé.

programme.title: A Bramble House Christmas
programme.desc: While settling his father's estate, a man becomes suspicious as to why the man left his nurse a large sum of money after knowing her for less than two months before he died.

programme.title: Speed Racer

programme.title: Pacific Rim
programme.desc: A washed-up ex-pilot and an untested trainee must drive an old, obsolete robot in a last-ditch effort to repel a lethal force of monstrous invaders.
